languages.text: {n}Глейто смотрит на Соломона и издает скрежещущий скулеж. Проктор тяжело вздыхает, прикрывая глаза рукой.{/n} "Ладно... В бездну! В отличие от маршала, вы меня еще не подводили".

{n}Glaito looks at Solomorne and lets out a grinding whimper. The Proctor sighs heavily, covering his eyes with his hand.{/n} "Fine... To the void with it! Unlike the Marshal, you haven't failed me yet."
languages.original_text: {n}Глейто смотрит на Соломона и издает скрежещущий скулеж. Проктор тяжело вздыхает, прикрывая глаза рукой.{/n} "Ладно... В бездну! В отличие от маршала, вы меня еще не подводили".

traits.locale_text: {n}Glaito looks at Solomorne and lets out a grinding whimper. The Proctor sighs heavily, covering his eyes with his hand.{/n} "Fine... Into the abyss! Unlike the Marshal, you haven't failed me yet."
{n}Glaito looks at Solomorne and lets out a grinding whimper. The Proctor sighs heavily, covering his eyes with his hand.{/n} "Fine... Into the abyss! Unlike the Marshal, you haven't failed me yet."
{n}Glaito looks at Solomorne and lets out a grinding whimper. The Proctor sighs heavily, covering his eyes with his hand.{/n} "Fine... Into the abyss! Unlike the Marshal, you haven't failed me yet."

{n}Glaito looks at Solomorne and lets out a grinding whimper. The Proctor sighs heavily, covering his eyes with his hand.{/n} "Fine... To the void with it! Unlike the Marshal, you haven't failed me yet."

{n}Glaito looks at Solomorne and lets out a grinding whimper. The Proctor sighs heavily, covering his eyes with his hand.{/n} "Fine... To the void with it! Unlike the Marshal, you haven't failed me yet."

languages.text: {n}Glaito sieht Solomorne an und beginnt zu winseln. Der Proktor seufzt schwer und bedeckt seine Augen mit seiner Hand.{/n} "Schön. Zur Leere damit. Im Gegensatz zum Marschall habt Ihr mich noch nicht enttäuscht."
languages.original_text: {n}Glaito looks at Solomorne and lets out a grinding whimper. The Proctor sighs heavily, covering his eyes with his hand.{/n} "Fine... To the void with it! Unlike the Marshal, you haven't failed me yet."

traits.locale_text: {n}Glaito sieht Solomorne an und beginnt zu winseln. Der Proktor seufzt schwer und bedeckt seine Augen mit seiner Hand.{/n} "Schön. Zur Leere damit. Im Gegensatz zum Marschall habt Ihr mich noch nicht enttäuscht."

languages.text: {n}Glaito lève les yeux vers Solomorne et laisse échapper un gémissement grinçant. Le proctor pousse un long soupir en se couvrant les yeux de la main.{/n} « Bien... Qu'il en soit ainsi ! Contrairement au maréchal, vous n'avez encore jamais fait l'erreur de me décevoir. »
languages.original_text: {n}Glaito looks at Solomorne and lets out a grinding whimper. The Proctor sighs heavily, covering his eyes with his hand.{/n} "Fine... To the void with it! Unlike the Marshal, you haven't failed me yet."

traits.locale_text: {n}Glaito lève les yeux vers Solomorne et laisse échapper un gémissement grinçant. Le proctor pousse un long soupir en se couvrant les yeux de la main.{/n} « Bien... Qu'il en soit ainsi ! Contrairement au maréchal, vous n'avez encore jamais fait l'erreur de me décevoir. »

languages.text: {n}格雷托看着索罗蒙，发出一声刺耳的呜咽。索罗蒙重重地叹了口气，用手捂住了眼睛。{/n}“好吧……去他妈的吧！你和元帅不一样，你从来没让我失望过。”
languages.original_text: {n}Glaito looks at Solomorne and lets out a grinding whimper. The Proctor sighs heavily, covering his eyes with his hand.{/n} "Fine... To the void with it! Unlike the Marshal, you haven't failed me yet."

traits.locale_text: {n}格雷托看着索罗蒙，发出一声刺耳的呜咽。索罗蒙重重地叹了口气，用手捂住了眼睛。{/n}“好吧……去他妈的吧！你和元帅不一样，你从来没让我失望过。”

languages.text: {n}Glaito mira a Solomorne y deja escapar un gemido chirriante. El Procurador suspira con pesadez y se cubre los ojos con la mano.{/n} «De acuerdo... ¡al vacío con ello! Al contrario que el Mariscal, tú aún no me has fallado».
languages.original_text: {n}Glaito looks at Solomorne and lets out a grinding whimper. The Proctor sighs heavily, covering his eyes with his hand.{/n} "Fine... To the void with it! Unlike the Marshal, you haven't failed me yet."

traits.locale_text: {n}Glaito mira a Solomorne y deja escapar un gemido chirriante. El Procurador suspira con pesadez y se cubre los ojos con la mano.{/n} «De acuerdo... ¡al vacío con ello! Al contrario que el Mariscal, tú aún no me has fallado».

languages.text: {n}グライトはソロモーンを見つめ、きしるようなすすり泣きを漏らした。代理人は重いため息をつき、手で目を覆った。{/n}「仕方ない…くそったれ！将帥とは違って、まだお前は俺を裏切ってはいない」
languages.original_text: {n}Glaito looks at Solomorne and lets out a grinding whimper. The Proctor sighs heavily, covering his eyes with his hand.{/n} "Fine... To the void with it! Unlike the Marshal, you haven't failed me yet."

traits.locale_text: {n}グライトはソロモーンを見つめ、きしるようなすすり泣きを漏らした。代理人は重いため息をつき、手で目を覆った。{/n}「仕方ない…くそったれ！将帥とは違って、まだお前は俺を裏切ってはいない」

languages.text: {n}Glaito, Solomorne'a bakıp gıcırtılı bir şekilde inliyor. Üsteğmen derin bir iç çekip eliyle gözlerini kapatıyor.{/n} "İyi... Uçsuz alsın hepsini! Miralay'ın aksine siz henüz beni yüzüstü bırakmadınız."
languages.original_text: {n}Glaito looks at Solomorne and lets out a grinding whimper. The Proctor sighs heavily, covering his eyes with his hand.{/n} "Fine... To the void with it! Unlike the Marshal, you haven't failed me yet."

traits.locale_text: {n}Glaito, Solomorn'a bakıp gıcırtılı bir şekilde inliyor. Üsteğmen derin bir iç çekip eliyle gözlerini kapatıyor.{/n} "İyi... Uçsuz alsın hepsini! Miralay'ın aksine siz, daha beni yüzüstü bırakmadınız."
